Description: Five beads in different shapes and materials. A: Two flattened spherical beads, with an edge running around the outer surface, made of white faience. B: Two segmented cylindrical beads, one made of light blue faience, one made of white faience. The longer blue is eight segments preserved. C: One disc-shaped bead made of light green faience, quite thick.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
